product_name: Wilderness Systems Focus 145 Kayak with Rudder
long_description: Built for paddlers ready to take their skills to the next level, the Wilderness Systems Focus(TM)145 Kayak with Rudder blends stability with efficiency for day tours. 14 ft. 6 in. length is the shortest of the Focus family and offers a 275 lb. weight capacity for paddlers and gear. Performance-inspired stern and bow result in a long water line for improved speed and glide, and shallow-V hull with rounded chine is easy to paddle in varying water types. Adjustable, padded thigh braces and hip pads, and a Phase 3(R) AirPro XP seating system and backband, make the Focus comfortable for longer paddling excursions. Hull is crafted in high-density polyethylene for amazing durability and easy care. Foot-pedal-controlled rudder system with cockpit deployment controls helps you steer and track effectively in rough water. Easily accessible front hatch and a smaller stern hatch offers ample storage space for dry bags and extra gear. Stern hatch, bow hatch and small midship day hatch all have bulkheads to keep gear dry and secure. Domed hatch covers offer a rugged watertight seal and tabs for easy removal. 48 lb. weight.
short_description: Built for paddlers ready to take their skills to the next level, the Wilderness Systems Focus(TM)145 Kayak with Rudder blends stability with efficiency for day tours.
